intro.title: Discover an unexplored universe.
intro.description: Venture into the fascinating world of programming and open doors to an innovative and opportunity-filled future.

timeline.title: Our Timeline
timeline.description: Explore the key milestones of our journey and see how each stage contributes to our progress.
timeline.htmlDesc: Our journey begins with HTML, the foundation that shapes the structure of the web.
timeline.cssDesc: Moving on to CSS, where aesthetics come to life with colors, fonts, and layouts.
timeline.jsDesc: With JavaScript, we bring pages to life with interactivity and dynamics.
timeline.githubDesc: Finally, with GitHub, we store, collaborate, and manage our creations.

ticket.title: Your Ticket
ticket.description: Choose your package and reserve now!
ticket.eBookDescription: Learn with our detailed e-book, covering all essential aspects.
ticket.videoDescription: Watch our video lesson and practice with practical examples.
ticket.completePackageDescription: Get the e-book and video lessons together at a special price.
